summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of West 85th Street and North 85th Street, between 24th Avenue Northwest and Meridian Avenue, all in the City of Seattle; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, and providing that the entire cost of such improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law
